name: Pull-Up
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip.
Pull chest to bar using back and lats.
Lower with control to full hang.
tips: Avoid kipping; use strict reps for strength.
ratingDesc: Top lat builder and strength test.

name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
instructions: Hinge at hips keeping back flat.
Pull bar to lower ribs while squeezing shoulder blades.
Lower bar under control.
tips: Keep neck neutral and hips steady.
ratingDesc: Essential thickness movement for the back.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit anchored, grip bar wide.
Pull to upper chest while squeezing lats.
Return under control.
tips: Avoid leaning back excessively; focus on lats.
ratingDesc: Great lat-width developer for all levels.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit upright with cable handle.
Pull handle to abdomen, squeeze shoulder blades.
Return with control.
tips: Use scapular retraction and avoid shrugging.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee on bench and row dumbbell to hip.
Squeeze lats at top, lower slowly.
Keep torso stable.
tips: Avoid rotating torso; focus on lat squeeze.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend.
Lower bar toward mid-shin keeping back flat.
Drive hips forward to stand.
tips: Focus on hip hinge and hamstring control.

name: Face Pulls
instructions: Set rope at face height and pull to forehead.
Separate hands and squeeze shoulder blades.
Return slowly with control.
tips: Excellent for shoulder health and posture.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Set bar at waist height and lie under it.
Pull chest to bar keeping body straight.
Lower under control.
tips: Adjust foot position to change difficulty.
ratingDesc: Great bodyweight row for back strength.
